title: Ep 70 | Willie Pays Jase to Stay Home, a Restaurant Owner's Coronavirus Wisdom & Quarantine TV Picks
description:
Jase was wary when Willie offered to pay him NOT to show up to Duck Commander, but he's feeling pretty good about it now. Phil, Jase, and Al share what they do with their old Bibles. Jase explains why he liked the recently canceled "Messiah" series, and the guys offer a few spoiler-free movie recommendations. A newly baptized "Unashamed" listener has an inspiring take on the tough times the coronavirus has caused for his restaurant chain, Hwy 55.

https://HomeTitleLock.com Enter Code PHIL
